name: mgpds
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ0
⊣ 2 ∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2
⊣ 2 ∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ cdc(1, 2)≠ 2

body.origin:
|- wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat2))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ 2 ∈ ℝ
⊣ 2[<]cdc(1, 2)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))

⊣ 2[<]cdc(1, 2)

-| wcel(nat2, cn0)

-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))

-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
